summary: This document is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 3, 2019. It lists staff assignments by post and shift times, and includes a separate inmate roster with names, booking dates, and housing locations. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison operations on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there, shortly before his death. This document is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) inmate roster dated August 3, 2019, listing hundreds of detainees with their names, registration numbers, housing units, and status codes (e.g., A-PRE, A-HLD, A-DES). It includes Jeffrey Epstein, who is listed as 'A-PRE' (likely present/pre-trial) in housing unit 9 South. The roster provides a snapshot of the inmate population at the MCC, including Epstein, shortly before his death.

events.description: A roster of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, is generated, listing Jeffrey Epstein and hundreds of other detainees.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated Saturday, August 3, 2019.
The document lists staff posts and shift assignments, including officers Bonilla, B, Farag, S, and Noel, T.
A separate inmate roster lists dozens of inmates with their booking dates and housing unit designations.
The document provides operational context for the prison where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time, shortly before his death on August 10, 2019.
The document includes a timestamp of '11212019 11:50:17 PM' and a transaction completion note, suggesting it is a system-generated log.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 3, 2019, with status 'A-PRE' and housing unit '9 South'.
The document is a comprehensive inmate roster showing hundreds of detainees, their registration details, housing units, and status codes (e.g., A-PRE, A-HLD, A-DES).
The roster provides a population count of 761 inmates at the start of the shift and includes references to other facilities like MDC Brooklyn and the Tombs.
Epstein's listing on this roster places him in federal custody at the MCC shortly before his death on August 10, 2019.
The document appears to be a standard Bureau of Prisons administrative record for population monitoring and census purposes.
